Text.Page:
There's no zealot like a new convert, I suppose.

The ducal loyalists and ducal bodyguards are more vicious than the old-time vampirs. They're downright bloodthirsty! Well, obviously vampirs are too, but you know what I mean...

So spill some ducal blood! And bring back proof. I like to know we're making progress.
That'll teach them to back the wrong side, eh, <PCNAME>?
Ducal loyalists and bodyguards. Should be simple. Go.
